alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 4:50PM EDT until April 01 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Southern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mechanicsburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Carlisle, Lower Allen, Hershey, Colonial Park, Elizabethtown, Progress, Mechanicsburg, Middletown, Camp Hill, Mount Joy and Palmyra. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 225 to 263. Interstate 81 between mile markers 48 and 64, and from mile markers 66 to 74. Interstate 83 from mile markers 28 to 50. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
